mapper.sql: id, name, user_name, password, job_num, company_id, office_id, email, phone, mobile, status, login_ip, login_time, add_time, add_user, update_time, update_user, remark, position, office_over
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
insert into arc_sys_user( name, user_name, password, job_num, company_id, office_id, email, phone, mobile, status, login_ip, login_time, add_time, add_user, update_time, update_user, remark, position, office_over ) values ( #{name}, #{userName}, #{password}, #{jobNumber}, #{companyId}, #{officeId}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, 0, #{loginIp}, #{loginTime}, #{addTime}, #{addUser}, #{updateTime}, #{updateUser}, #{remark}, #{position}, #{officeOver} )
mapper.update: update arc_sys_user set name=#{name}, job_num=#{jobNumber}, company_id=#{companyId}, office_id=#{officeId}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, password=#{password}, mobile=#{mobile}, status=#{status}, update_time= #{updateTime}, update_user=#{updateUser}, remark=#{remark}, position=#{position} where id = #{id}
update arc_sys_user set login_ip=#{loginIp}, login_time= #{loginTime} where user_name = #{userName}
mapper.select: SELECT count(u.id) FROM arc_sys_user u, arc_sys_user_role ur WHERE u.id = ur.user_id AND ur.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT usr.company_id as companyId, usr.office_id as officeId, ur.role_id as roleId FROM ACT_HI_TASKINST task_ins INNER JOIN arc_sys_user usr on usr.user_name = task_ins.ASSIGNEE_ INNER JOIN arc_sys_user_role ur on ur.user_id = usr.id INNER JOIN arc_sys_role role on role.id = ur.role_id WHERE task_ins.PROC_INST_ID_ = #{processInstanceId} AND task_ins.TASK_DEF_KEY_ = #{taskDef} AND role.nid = task_ins.DESCRIPTION_

select u.id from arc_sys_user u, arc_sys_role r, arc_sys_user_role ur where ur.role_id = r.id and ur.user_id = u.id
and r.nid = #{roleNid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and u.name like concat("%",#{name, jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and u.user_name like concat("%",#{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
and u.job_num like concat("%",#{jobNum, jdbcType=VARCHAR},"%")
